metadata.title: CVE-2020-25713 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
A malformed input file can lead to a segfault due to an out of bounds arrayaccess in raptor_xml_writer_start_element_common.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25713` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraptor2-0 - 2.0.16-4
raptor2-utils - 2.0.16-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: raptor2 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.16-4').
